info.title: Analytics API
info.description: Includes all API endpoints for data analytics.

post.summary: Search for balances for a connected business

requestBody.description: The account balance model within the search query

post.summary: Search for bank transactions for a connected business

requestBody.description: The bank transaction model within the search query

get.summary: Get a singular bank transaction by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier for the bank transaction

post.summary: Get all commerce transactions for a connected business

requestBody.description: The commerce transaction model within the search query, you can use this to sort or search for any column within the model

get.summary: The balance sheet report is a standard financial report which describes the financial position of an organisation at a point in time.

parameters.name: balanceDate
parameters.description: Specifies the date for balance sheet report

parameters.name: months
parameters.description: The number of months to run the balance sheet for

get.summary:
The statement of cash flows - direct method, provides the year to date changes in operating, financing and investing cash
flow activities for an organisation. Cashflow statement is not available in US region at this stage.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Specifies the start date for cash flow report. If no parameter is provided, the date of 12 months before the end date will be used.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Specifies the end date for cash flow report. If no parameter is provided, the current date will be used.

get.summary: The profit and loss statement is a standard financial report providing detailed year to date income and expense detail for an organisation.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description:
Specifies the start date for profit and loss report
            If no parameter is provided, the date of 12 months before the end date will be used.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description:
Specifies the end date for profit and loss report
            If no parameter is provided, the current date will be used.

post.summary:
Use this method to retrieve one or many invoices.
When you retrieve multiple invoices, only a summary of the contact is returned and no line details are returned - this is to keep the response more compact.
The line item details will be returned when you retrieve an individual invoice, either by specifying Invoice ID, Invoice Number, querying by Statuses or by using the optional paging parameter (below).
When you retrieve invoices by querying by Statuses, pagination is enforced by default.
Individual invoices (e.g. Invoices/97c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9) can also be returned as PDF's see our HTTP GET documentation

requestBody.description: The invoice model within the search query

post.summary: Use this method to create or update an invoice

parameters.name: connectedAccountId
parameters.description: The Id of the connected account

requestBody.description: The body of the invoice to update or create

Bearer.description:
e.g Bearer Api_Key.

Requests to the Airslip API are authenticated using the applications `Api_Key`. You can view and manage your credentials in the Airslip Dashboard.

An Api_Key provides connectivity to all authenticated Airslip API endpoints, so it is important to keep these credentials secure. Do not share your Api_Key in publicly accessible areas such as GitHub, client-side code, or easily accessible configuration settings.

Authentication is performed using Bearer Authentication. Your Api_Key should be sent as the token.

All requests should be made via HTTPS.
Bearer.name: Authorization
